titles.title: President's Commission on Veterans and Smoking Act
To establish the President's Commission on Veterans and Smoking.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/16/2000--Introduced. President's Commission on Veterans and Smoking Act - Establishes the President's Commission on Veterans and Smoking to study and report to the President and Congress on issues including: (1) the extent to which the past policy of the armed forces contributed to veterans becoming smokers; (2) the percentage of veteran smokers compared to the percentage of smokers in the general U.S. population; and (3) the incidence and severity of smoking-related illnesses among veterans compared to the general U.S. population. Authorizes appropriations.
